attributes.action: Stop making NHS workers pay for parking
attributes.additional_details:
NHS staff are having to pay around £12-15 per day to park their cars, that is more than an hourly rate of most NHS workers. They go to work and save peoples lives why should they have to pay to park too? During covid pandemic parking became free, their jobs have not changed!
Many staff start early or finish late when the buses don't run or work on Sundays or bank holiday with a limited bus service. 
People save peoples lives should atleast be able to park their cars when they come to work!
attributes.background: Make parking free for NHS staff.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612699
